summary: Brings the customization capabilities of my Customizer framework to Seductress Serana by damnyou123 ! Contains all the options you've come to expect of a CC Customizer.
descriptionHtml:
[center][center][size=6][/size][/center][font=Verdana][center][img]https://imageshack.com/a/img924/5652/GXde00.png[/img][/center][center][b][i][size=3][color=#e69138]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/ClearanceClarenceMods][img]https://imageshack.com/a/img924/1402/x3ny5B.jpg[/img][/url][/color]

[color=#93c47d]Screenshots are Wanted! If some of you could upload some screenshots it would be much appreciated![/color][/size][/i][/b]

[size=3]This mod allows you to change the way Serana looks. You can change the body textures, face and eyes.[/size][/center]

[center][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/320x240q90/922/tUyKv0.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52907]Seductress Serana [/url][/size][/center]Made for V3.2
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/2578/9D7W5O.png[/img][/center][center][color=#0b8db3][size=6]Manual Installation[/size][/color]
[size=3]Download the package you want and extract it using WinRar. Now you have 3 folders. Base, FOMod and Options. Delete the FOMod folder since you won't need it. Now go to the base folder and select the bodytype you want and open that folder and copy the .nif files to [color=#6aa84f]meshes\actors\character\character assets\Serana[i][/i][/color] and overwrite the .nif files. Also be sure to install meshes from [color=#6aa84f]base\feet[/color] and [color=#6aa84f]base\hands[/color] to the same folder. Now the body is installed. Now go into the options folder and chose what kind of texture you want. Once you find it open it and copy all the files to t[color=#6aa84f]extures\actors\character\female\Serana[/color]. The eyes goes into [i][color=#6aa84f][/color][color=#6aa84f]textures\actors\character\female\Serana[/color][i][color=#6aa84f][/color].[/i][/i]
[/size][/center]
[center][color=#0B8DB3][size=6]Credits[/size][/color]

[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]CBBE Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url][/i][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]UNP Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP Blessed Body[/url][/i][/size]
